page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: {HOBKIRK SCHOOL }is the village primary school,situated in this block.Most of the children aged between 5 and 12 attend here,and at the moment there are 45 enrolled.(The roll fluctuates due to the frequent movement of families in and out of the area. The future of the school is currently under review under the Borders Primary Education Policy Plan.)There are two classes,taught by two full-time and three visiting part-time teachers for music,gym and reading.There is a part time Auxilliary and two kitchen staff. It was built in 1936 and has three classrooms,a hall,staffroom, and a kitchen where lunch is cooked. Outside there are grass and tarmac play areas,and a conservation area planted with young British deciduous trees. {continued:
